targets.label: Baseline
targets.sqlExpression: SELECT SUM(DesiredTaskCount) FROM "ECS/ContainerInsights" WHERE ClusterName = 'auto-benchmark-baseline-cluster' ORDER BY SUM() ASC

targets.label: Scale
targets.sqlExpression: SELECT SUM(DesiredTaskCount) FROM "ECS/ContainerInsights" WHERE ClusterName = 'auto-benchmark-scale-cluster' AND ServiceName = 'auto-benchmark-scale-service-fastapi' ORDER BY SUM() ASC

targets.label: Consumer
targets.sqlExpression: SELECT SUM(DesiredTaskCount) FROM "ECS/ContainerInsights" WHERE ClusterName = 'auto-benchmark-kafka-cluster' AND ServiceName = 'auto-benchmark-kafka-service-consumer' ORDER BY SUM() ASC

targets.label: Outbox
targets.sqlExpression: SELECT SUM(DesiredTaskCount) FROM "ECS/ContainerInsights" WHERE ClusterName = 'auto-benchmark-kafka-cluster' AND ServiceName = 'auto-benchmark-kafka-service-consumer' ORDER BY SUM() ASC
